description.text: You implant within the minds of your targets the illusion that they are engulfed in tangled webs teeming with swarms of tiny spiders. Those who fail to disbelieve the phantasmal webare treated as if in a webspell, but must also make a Fortitude save at the beginning of each turn or become nauseated for that round by the phantasmal spiders.

sections.Targets: one creature/level, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart
sections.Saving Throw: Will disbelief, then Fortitude partial, see text
